products.title: Turin 25mm Primary Red Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Opt for their primary red 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blind for a pop of colour in your home or office. Primary red is a wonderful colour perfect that reminds us of strength and passion. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it fits straight onto upvc frames with no need for screws or drills. Product id: db-dpfven0369 fabric colour: primary red s25022 material: aluminium headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clip slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: tilt wand, tensioned cord-free raise.

products.description: Their extensive range of gloss and matt finishes in a full spectrum of colour means we are sure you will find something for you. products.title: Kana Merlot Red Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their kana collection of pleated free-hanging blinds features all of their favourite contemporary neutrals and bright colours. Their merlot red is a deep and rich tone perfect for a moody and atmospheric colour scheme. Product id: sdb-pfp0174 fabric colour: merlot red material: 100% polyester headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clips control type: manual tensioned pull handle energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - added thermal retention due to framework light filtering: yes kana merlot red perfect fit pleated blind in red.

products.title: Infusion Solar Raspberry Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Infusion solar not only brings fresh varied colours to your home but the added benefit of a solar control coating to reduce direct sunlight reducing harmful uv rays, keeping furnishings looking vibrant. A berry-licious shade, raspberry is a strong pink shade, great for creating contrast or even complimenting a bright summery colour theme. Product id: db-nfpl0009 fabric colour: raspberry material: 100% polyester headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.
